pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovadanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.5: “Yampi mayaṃ, ayye, gaccheyyāma ovādassa kāraṇā, ayyā chabbaggiyā idheva āgantvā amhe ovadantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.8: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.9: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.10: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.11: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.14: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.16: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.17: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:1.18: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena mahāpajāpati gotamī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.2: Therā bhikkhū yena mahāpajāpati gotamī tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.7: “Na, bhagini, kappati bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo dhammaṃ desetun”ti kukkuccāyantā na desesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.8: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena mahāpajāpati gotamī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.9: Nisajja kho bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.11: “Pubbe me, bhante, therā bhikkhū āgantvā dhammaṃ desenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.13: Idāni pana—‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti, kukkuccāyantā na desenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.15: Atha kho bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.16: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.17: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gilānaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ovadituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.18: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.19: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:2.20: Tatthāyaṃ samayo. Gilānā hoti bhikkhunī—ayaṃ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.1.16: na sakkoti ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā gantuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.2.1: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññī bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.2.2: Upasampannāya vematiko bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc23:3.2.3: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññī bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā aññatra samayā ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
